Text: MrDowntown thank you so much, Batman: Hush was one of the batman stories I enjoyed the most, and I was looking for this one
Yeah Ive been compiling Hush's appearances, theyre very spread out.

Though this story is kind of part three as Hush Returns, which would be part 2 of the Hush Saga starts in Gotham Knights #50, I believe and ends in #74:
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4123062/Batman_Gotham_Knights_1-74
And, you got the 'trusted' skull. Congrats man, keep up your good work :-)
one of the nicest storylines. Thanks sir!!
